title: ORANGE SLICE COOKIES
directions: Cut each orange slice into eight pieces. Roll in 1/4 cup sugar; set aside. In a mixing bowl, cream the butter, shortening, brown sugar and remaining sugar. Add eggs, one at a time, beating well after each addition. Beat in vanilla. Combine the flour, baking soda and salt; gradually add to creamed mixture. Stir in chips, pecans and orange slice pieces.
Roll into 1-in. balls. Place 2 in. apart on ungreased baking sheets. Bake at 375Â° for 10-12 minutes or until golden brown. Remove to wire racks to cool. Yield: about 10 dozen.
ingredients: 1 package (12 ounces) vanilla chips or white chips
